ValidationRule.description: NOKIASC-34848: To prevent Users to update Record Type, with exception to System Administrator and Data Loader Profile, on CARES and Vendor Service Contracts.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_ServiceContract', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_VendorContract' ), ISCHANGED (RecordTypeId), $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to Update the Record Type.
